title: Aki Arimizu
text:
is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="Cerezo%20Osaka">Cerezo Osaka</a>.
Career.
Aki Arimizu joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Cerezo%20Osaka">Cerezo Osaka</a> in 2017.
